page.title: 16Food We Eat in Anstruther
page.content:
We asked people to note what they eat in 1 day. Here are 2 daily diets.
Marie - 1 slice toast + 1 cup of tea 1 pkt salt & vinegar crisps mince pie + peas + chips 1 cup of water + 2 Opal Fruits 1 strawberry jelly macaroni + cheese + chips 1 mug coffee + 1 ice pole 1 lettuce/crisp sandwich
Euan - 1 bowl cereal + 1 glass milk 1 pkt scampi crisps 1 bowl chicken & leek soup 2 salad sandwiches + 1 Kit-Kat 1 pkt mild curry crisps 1 carton "Umbongo" fruit juice spare ribs + French bread 1 bowl ice cream + 1 mug milk 1 pkt "Minstrel" sweets 1 pkt haggis crisps + cup milk
